name: letterfeed
description: LetterFeed is a simple self-hosted platform for publishing newsletters. It offers a minimal editor and public feed, allowing individuals or teams to manage newsletters without relying on third-party services.
features: Newsletter Publishing: Simple editor, Public feed, Subscriber management. Publish newsletters independently.
Self-Hosted: No third-party services, Full control, Privacy-focused. Own your newsletter platform.
Minimal Design: Clean interface, Focus on content, Easy to use. Write and publish without distractions.
Subscriber Management: Email lists, Subscription forms, Unsubscribe handling. Manage your audience.
Content Editor: Rich text editing, Markdown support, Preview mode. Create beautiful newsletters.
Public Feed: RSS support, Archive access, Shareable links. Make content discoverable.
Email Delivery: SMTP integration, Bulk sending, Delivery tracking. Reach subscribers reliably.
Analytics: Open rates, Subscriber growth, Engagement metrics. Understand your audience.
